Good old Half-life 2...    Where do i start..

Half-life 2 is a classic. Even though i wasn't born until a year after it's release, and didn't discover it until a few months ago, It is clear how big impact this game had on the gaming industry (Half-life 1 would be more fitting for this i guess).  The graphics are from 2004, but still looks pretty realistic. You can interact with a lot of stuff, from lockers in a train station to trash laying on the side of a road. The game has some very good songs as well, such as "Lambda core" and "Something secret steers us" (with the latter one being my favourite).
I'm not exactly a good reviewer, but i hope this review was good enough. 

9/10
